div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 665 Tiranë, Albania, 1963 Burial: c. 48 B.C. Contents: 63 AR. Pot hoard Apollonia: 7 dr. Dyrrhachium: 16 dr.; 1 hemidr. Roman Rep.: 39 den. (to 49 B.C.) Disposition: Tiranë † Ceka, Studime Historike 1 (1966), pp. 3-11, 16-23, illus. (in Albanian; French summary); Studia Albanica 1 (1966), pp. 217-23
